description: This file defines an Angular service called StorageService that provides an abstraction over localStorage with JSON serialization, namespacing, and environment-based configuration. It includes functions for accessing window and localStorage objects, manages versioning, and exposes methods to set, get, and remove data in storage.

classes.name: StorageService
classes.description: An Angular service that wraps localStorage with JSON parsing, namespacing, and environment-aware versioning.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the StorageService, sets up namespace based on environment, and manages version migration.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Generates a namespaced key for storage.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Stores a JSON-serializable value under a specified key in localStorage.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a JSON value from localStorage, with optional fallback.
